ygData.subject: Re: Kithicor Travels
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: scott brisko  To:  Sent: Tuesday, November 02, 1999 5:14 PM Subject: [eqbards] Kithicor Travels ...
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: scott brisko <scott@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 02, 1999 5:14 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Kithicor Travels


> From: scott@... (scott brisko)
>
<snip>
> make me feel any better. I kicked up Selo's said a silent prayer to Karana
> and bolted down the path to the South. Just passing the HighHold marker I
<snip>

Word of advice - stick to the (right) wall. On the zone from WC - hug the
wall - and keep doing so. Be careful not to take falling damage -
especially around the RV zone. Get off the wall and run around it. Get
back on the wall and hug it. You'll see "stone" again. Get down - you'll
catch up with the trail and you can follow it a very short way to the HP
zone.

It's safer - and easier to keep your party from getting separated in the
dark and fog...

Slyde of Xegony
Level 26
